name: Demonic Pack
description:
Ten demons have escaped from the depths of hell, so the authorities of the earth ask you to be careful. Demons can seem attractive, cute and sexy to you, so be careful.
How to recognize a demon? Everything is very simple, the demon has horns and a tail, and to see it you need to move the tiles in different directions to see the details that I wrote about earlier.
Game features:
10 different, cute and sexy demon girls;
10 achievements;
Gallery;
Relaxing and romantic music;
